channel.title: Artifacts on Swarm Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Artifacts on Swarm Handbook

item.title: Smoke (end-to-end) test status
item.description: We have a few different types of smoke tests: Upload speed smoke test Upload and sync smoke test Sliding window smoke test Feed sync smoke test PSS smoke test (in-progress) These are all meant to be long-running tests targetted at long-running environments (for example staging-private), so that we know that Swarm process does not have resource leaks, and so that we collect measurements in terms how long it takes to perform these tests on a given Swarm version/commit.
